def get_job(job_name, transcribe_client): """ Gets details about a transcription job.
:param job_name: The name of the job to retrieve. :param transcribe_client: The Boto3 Transcribe client. :return: The retrieved transcription job. """ try: response = transcribe_client.get_transcription_job( TranscriptionJobName=job_name) job = response['TranscriptionJob'] logger.info("Got job %s.", job['TranscriptionJobName']) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get job %s.", job_name) raise else: return job
